verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* the \w uproar|strong="G2351"\w* was \w ceased|strong="G3973"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* called \w unto|strong="G4341"\w* \add him\add* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w embraced|strong="G0782"\w* \add them\add*, and \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* for to \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when he had gone \w over|strong="G1330"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w parts|strong="G3313"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* had \w given|strong="G3870"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w exhortation|strong="G3056"\w*, he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Greece|strong="G1671"\w*,

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \add there\add* \w abode|strong="G4160"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*. And \w when|strong="G1096"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* laid \w wait|strong="G1917"\w* for \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, as he was \w about|strong="G3195"\w* to \w sail|strong="G0321"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w*, \w he|strong="G1096"\w* \w purposed|strong="G1106"\w* to \w return|strong="G5290"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w accompanied|strong="G4902"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G0891"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w* \w Sopater|strong="G4986"\w* of \w Berea|strong="G0961"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* of the \w Thessalonians|strong="G2331"\w*, \w Aristarchus|strong="G0708"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Secundus|strong="G4580"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Gaius|strong="G1050"\w* of \w Derbe|strong="G1190"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* of \w Asia|strong="G0774"\w*, \w Tychicus|strong="G5190"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Trophimus|strong="G5161"\w*.
\w These|strong="G3778"\w* going \w before|strong="G4281"\w* \w tarried|strong="G3306"\w* for \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Troas|strong="G5174"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* sailed \w away|strong="G1602"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Philippi|strong="G5375"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="G0106"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Troas|strong="G5174"\w* \w in|strong="G0891"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*; \w where|strong="G3757"\w* we \w abode|strong="G1304"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1722"\w* \w upon|strong="G1161"\w* the \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \add day\add* of the \w week|strong="G4521"\w*, \w when|strong="G4863"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* came \w together|strong="G4863"\w* to \w break|strong="G2806"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w preached|strong="G1256"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w ready|strong="G3195"\w* to \w depart|strong="G1826"\w* on the \w morrow|strong="G1887"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w continued|strong="G3905"\w* his \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* \w until|strong="G3360"\w* \w midnight|strong="G3317"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w many|strong="G2425"\w* \w lights|strong="G2985"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the upper \w chamber|strong="G5253"\w*, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* gathered \w together|strong="G4863"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* a \w window|strong="G2376"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* young \w man|strong="G3494"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Eutychus|strong="G2161"\w*, being \w fallen|strong="G2702"\w* into a \w deep|strong="G0901"\w* \w sleep|strong="G5258"\w*: and \w as|strong="G1909"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w was|strong="G1256"\w* \w long|strong="G4119"\w* \w preaching|strong="G1256"\w*, he sunk \w down|strong="G2702"\w* \w with|strong="G0575"\w* \w sleep|strong="G5258"\w*, and fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the third \w loft|strong="G5152"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was \w taken|strong="G0142"\w* \w up|strong="G2736"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* went \w down|strong="G2597"\w*, and \w fell|strong="G1968"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w embracing|strong="G4843"\w* \add him\add* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Trouble|strong="G2350"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G2350"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w life|strong="G5590"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* he therefore was come up \w again|strong="G0305"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* had \w broken|strong="G2806"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w eaten|strong="G1089"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w talked|strong="G3656"\w* \w a|strong="G1909"\w* long \w while|strong="G2425"\w*, even \w till|strong="G0891"\w* break of \w day|strong="G0827"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* he \w departed|strong="G1831"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* the young \w man|strong="G3816"\w* \w alive|strong="G2198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3870"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w little|strong="G3357"\w* \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* went \w before|strong="G4281"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, and \w sailed|strong="G0321"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Assos|strong="G0789"\w*, \w there|strong="G1564"\w* \w intending|strong="G3195"\w* to \w take|strong="G0353"\w* in \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w had|strong="G2258"\w* he \w appointed|strong="G1299"\w*, \w minding|strong="G3195"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* to go \w afoot|strong="G3978"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* he \w met|strong="G4820"\w* with \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Assos|strong="G0789"\w*, we \w took|strong="G0353"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G0353"\w*, and \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Mitylene|strong="G3412"\w*.

And we \w sailed|strong="G0636"\w* \w thence|strong="G2547"\w*, and \w came|strong="G2658"\w* the \w next|strong="G1966"\w* \add day\add* over \w against|strong="G0481"\w* \w Chios|strong="G5508"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the \w next|strong="G2087"\w* \add day\add* we \w arrived|strong="G3846"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Samos|strong="G4544"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tarried|strong="G3306"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Trogyllium|strong="G5175"\w*; and the \w next|strong="G2192"\w* \add day\add* we \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Miletus|strong="G3399"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* had \w determined|strong="G2919"\w* to sail \w by|strong="G3896"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w because|strong="G3704"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w would|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* spend the \w time|strong="G5551"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w hasted|strong="G4692"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* it \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w possible|strong="G1415"\w* for \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, to \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w Pentecost|strong="G4005"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Miletus|strong="G3399"\w* he \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, and \w called|strong="G3333"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* of the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* they were \w come|strong="G3854"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1987"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* I \w came|strong="G1910"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*, after what \w manner|strong="G4459"\w* I have \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* at \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w seasons|strong="G5550"\w*,

\w Serving|strong="G1398"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* humility of \w mind|strong="G5012"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* with \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w tears|strong="G1144"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w temptations|strong="G3986"\w*, which \w befell|strong="G4819"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the lying in \w wait|strong="G1917"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*:

\add And\add* \w how|strong="G5613"\w* I kept \w back|strong="G5288"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* that was \w profitable|strong="G4851"\w* \add unto you\add*, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* have \w shewed|strong="G0312"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w publickly|strong="G1219"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G2596"\w* house to \w house|strong="G3624"\w*,

\w Testifying|strong="G1263"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* to the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, and \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w*, \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* shall \w befall|strong="G4876"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w there|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w Save|strong="G4133"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w witnesseth|strong="G1263"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* every \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w afflictions|strong="G2347"\w* \w abide|strong="G3306"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* of these \w things|strong="G3056"\w* move \w me|strong="G4160"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* count \w I|strong="G2192"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w life|strong="G5590"\w* \w dear|strong="G5093"\w* unto \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*, \w so|strong="G5613"\w* that I might \w finish|strong="G5048"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w course|strong="G1408"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, to \w testify|strong="G1263"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w gone|strong="G1330"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2784"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, shall \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* I \w take|strong="G3143"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* to \w record|strong="G3143"\w* \w this|strong="G4594"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \add am\add* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w have|strong="G5288"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w shunned|strong="G5288"\w* \w to|strong="G3361"\w* \w declare|strong="G0312"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w counsel|strong="G1012"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

¶ Take \w heed|strong="G4337"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* unto \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w flock|strong="G4168"\w*, \w over|strong="G1722"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* hath \w made|strong="G5087"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w overseers|strong="G1985"\w*, to \w feed|strong="G4165"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w purchased|strong="G4046"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w departing|strong="G0867"\w* shall \w grievous|strong="G0926"\w* \w wolves|strong="G3074"\w* \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* in \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w sparing|strong="G5339"\w* the \w flock|strong="G4168"\w*.

\w Also|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* own \w selves|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G0435"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w arise|strong="G0450"\w*, \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* perverse \w things|strong="G1294"\w*, to draw \w away|strong="G0645"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w watch|strong="G1127"\w*, and \w remember|strong="G3421"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* by the space of three \w years|strong="G5148"\w* I \w ceased|strong="G3973"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w warn|strong="G3560"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w tears|strong="G1144"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3908"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G3588"\w*, I \w commend|strong="G5209"\w* \w you|strong="G0080"\w* to \w God|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G3588"\w* to the \w word|strong="G3588"\w* of \w his|strong="G3588"\w* \w grace|strong="G0846"\w*, which is \w able|strong="G2026"\w* to build you \w up|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G1325"\w* to \w give|strong="G5213"\w* \w you|strong="G2817"\w* an \w inheritance|strong="G1722"\w* \w among|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* them \w which|strong="G0037"\w* are \w sanctified|strong="G3956"\w*.
I have \w coveted|strong="G1937"\w* no \w man’s|strong="G3762"\w* \w silver|strong="G0694"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w gold|strong="G5553"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w apparel|strong="G2441"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="G1161"\w*, \w ye|strong="G1097"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* have \w ministered|strong="G5256"\w* unto \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w necessities|strong="G5532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*.

I have \w shewed|strong="G5263"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, how \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w labouring|strong="G2872"\w* ye \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w support|strong="G0482"\w* the \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* to \w remember|strong="G3421"\w* the \w words|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w how|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w It is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w more|strong="G3123"\+w* \+w blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+w to give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w than|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w to receive|strong="G2983"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w*, he kneeled \w down|strong="G1119"\w*, and \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2425"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w wept|strong="G1096"\w* \w sore|strong="G2805"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fell|strong="G1968"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w Paul’s|strong="G3972"\w* \w neck|strong="G5137"\w*, and \w kissed|strong="G2705"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w Sorrowing|strong="G3600"\w* most of \w all|strong="G3122"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* the \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2046"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w see|strong="G2334"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w accompanied|strong="G4311"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*.
